channel.title: Homes on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Academic

item.description: Biography Adi Maciel is a financial analyst at Positivo Tecnologia, where his work is focused on Investor Relations and Treasury Areas. He is responsible for market analysis, development and analysis of economic scenarios, report of financial results to the company’s investors, hedge controlling, hedge planning, forecasting and report of monthly and annual results. Education Federal University of Paran√° (2014 - Expected 2018⁄02) - Statistics. Professional Experiences Positivo Tecnologia (2017 - Current) - Investor Relations & Treasury.
